### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2F) ### Comment > 1. Enable AdGuard > 2. Go to Spotify > 3. Play some music until ad shows up > 4. AdGuard blocks it, and sometimes it just stops there - it doesn't skip it. issue.title: aa.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://aa.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faa.com)
### Comment
> Many of the sub menus in the American Airlines app on Android 15 do not work when dns.adguard.com is being used.  For example, opening the app, then selecting account details such that "Rewards/Promotions/Travel Credits" is displayed at the bottom, then swiping up on this screen and clicking "Your activity" results in the error "Unable to load menu".  The error is not present with standard DNS being used.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8noo4eudtlwkk4ks4o0c408ckkc40wws5idxztd740.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/7xhya3xs77k044k8sw8w444c8os04g4nhafo8zmng0.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | Pixel 7, Android 15
Browser: | American Airlines app

comment.body:
It seems that it's related to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/179278 and required rule is not available in optimized filter list for Android.
Could you please add this rule:
```adblock
@@||turramusic.com.au^$xmlhttprequest,elemhide,jsinject,extension
```
to user rules and then check if issue still occurs?
On my Android device it fixes the problem.

comment.body:
Hi Alex, I can repro on multiple Android devices.
Note, that the image flashing only occurs on their 'collections' pages, and not on the main page. I've recorded a video as screenshots do not give a complete overview of the problem.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/41e043f7-47cf-4b73-a35e-bbc0e10d96f6



I've tried disabling:

- tracking protection - no change
- ad blocking - no change
- annoyance blocking - no change
- DNS protection - no change
- Firewall - no change
- Browsing Security - no change

The only way I have found to mitigate the issue is either disable AG or add _www.turramusic.com.au_ to Website allowlist.

I've grabbed some Debug logs as well.
[adguard_logs_4.6.207_0312_131246.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17988832/adguard_logs_4.6.207_0312_131246.zip)

comment.body:
Не повторяется с фильтрами AdGuard, а также сторонними из вашей конфигурации. Данный сайт мы не блокируем.
Какую ошибку показывает браузер? Посмотреть можно нажав на `Подробнее`.
Попробуйте также оставить только фильтры AdGuard. В крайнем случае переустановите расширение.

comment.body:
Hello @Janet-x
As for "sponsored" links, please report them and we will remove them if they are advertising.
I checked several apps from your list with your settings and could not reproduce the ads. Please clear the cache of these applications and check again.
As for push notifications, AdGuard cannot remove them, you need to configure them in settings > app notifications.
If the issue persists, please contact our support support@adguard.com

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://aa.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faa.com)
### Comment
> Many of the sub menus in the American Airlines app on Android 15 do not work when dns.adguard.com is being used.  For example, opening the app, then selecting account details such that "Rewards/Promotions/Travel Credits" is displayed at the bottom, then swiping up on this screen and clicking "Your activity" results in the error "Unable to load menu".  The error is not present with standard DNS being used.

comment.body:
Cannot be fixed with DNS - they want to load analytics.

You may try AdGuard Private DNS and add to user rules these lines:
```
@@||dpm.demdex.net^
@@||www.everestjs.net^
@@||cdn.quantummetric.com^
@@||s.go-mpulse.net^
@@||rl.quantummetric.com^
@@||ingest.quantummetric.com^
@@||aa-sync.quantummetric.com^
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.defriesland.nl/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.defriesland.nl%2F) ### Comment > This concerns the following websites: > https://www.defriesland.nl/ > https://www.zilverenkruis.nl/ > https://www.dechristelijkezorgverzekeraar.nl/ > https://www.fbto.nl/ > https://www.interpolis.nl/ > https://www.achmea.nl/ > > All of these (health) insurance companies belong to the same concern (Achmea). I'm sure this has to do with why none of them work. > I've tried Chrome, Edge, and Brave, and they all return a "This site can't be reached". > I've tried turning off everything I can in Adguard, but this did not work. Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Было исправлено, нужно будет сделать следующее через пару часов:
1. Обновить фильтры
2. Остановить приложение
3. Очистить его данные (желательно не только кэш, но и хранилище данных)
4. Запустить его.
